description: Sierre leone is calling a 12 month state of Public health emergency as of March 24th despite having not recorded any cases of the Coronavirus at that time.
On March 27th, the government of Sierre Leone announced the the country will be closing its borders fo3 30 days with the exception of cargo vehicles which will be inspected and monitored.

The government announced on 13th March it was working round the clock to manage any cases that could occur and it had capacity to test any case that may occur in three facilities already.They said they had prepared 34 military hospitals for use of taking care and testing Corona patients Incase the need arises and that they were working closely with who for this
